snippet: His team flat, listless and basically overwhelmed during a miserable first period against Buffalo on Sunday, Pittsburgh Penguins coach Mike Sullivan looked down his bench searching for a jolt....

headline.main: Dr. Thomas E. Starzl, Pioneering Liver Surgeon, Dies at 90
headline.print_headline: Thomas E. Starzl, Pioneering Liver Surgeon, Dies at 90

lead_paragraph: His team flat, listless and basically overwhelmed during a miserable first period against Buffalo on Sunday, Pittsburgh Penguins coach Mike Sullivan looked down his bench searching for a jolt.
